```{r}
library(dismo)
file <- paste(system.file(package="dismo"), "/ex/bradypus.csv", sep="")

# this is the file we will use:
file

```

```{r}

bradypus <- read.table(file,  header=TRUE,  sep=",")
bradypus <- bradypus[,2:3]
head(bradypus)
```
